title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama server; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same capabilities as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package providing Ollama LLM and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Clean open-source ChatGPT-style web interface that talks to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with readline, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama covering chat, embeddings, and model management with fluent builders.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated collection of Modelfile recipes and quantized GGUFs ready for ollama pull.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Lightweight Discord bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to generate code, refactor, or chat with Ollama models without leaving the editor.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama chat & embeddings as REST endpoints with API key auth.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that compares answers from multiple Ollama models side-by-side.

title: ollama-unity
summary: Unity plugin (C#) for invoking Ollama models in games or AR/VR experiences over HTTP.

title: ollama-express
summary: Starter repo showing how to build a secure Express proxy around Ollama with rate-limit and JWT auth.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm ideas, or generate text using local Ollama models.

title: awesome-ollama
summary: Crowd-sourced Awesome list indexing tools, integrations, tutorials, and model repos for Ollama.
